name: The Sun Goes Down
description:
Adventure with characters in different dimensions.
Can you save your shadow before the sun goes down?

Take the reins of a cute butterfly in a lowpoly world
and take on the challenge of logic puzzles under time pressure!


Developed by one-person team in less than 2 days for GMTK GameJam 2021.
     * it's my first GameJam

I wish you lots of fun !!
